rules.description: Change shift + delete to forward delete (rev 2)
Post Esc if Caps is tapped, Control if held.
Have F1/F2 act as standard function keys in Kitty

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Press [v] again to go back to Vim Mode" with title "-- VISUAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'

rules.description: (1/2) Do not auto close brackets & quotes when holding fn
